00045 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 void BodyActivityModel::UpdateSalesRepHist()  {
00047         POSITION pos = doc->bodymodel.body.GetStartPosition();
00048         while (pos) {
00049                 int id; Body *b;
00050                 doc->bodymodel.body.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, b);
00051                 if (::In(m_salesRepID, id))
00052                         b->HistogramCompute(imgFrame, m_salesRepHist.h, 1);     
00053         }
00054 }
00055 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 void BodyActivityModel::DrawSalesReps(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00057         POSITION pos = doc->bodymodel.body.GetStartPosition();
00058         while (pos) {
00059                 int id; Body *b;
00060                 doc->bodymodel.body.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, b);
00061                 double d = b->color.Compare(&m_salesRepHist);
00062                 if (d > m_SalesRepHistThreshold)
00063                         b->DrawSalesRepMark(frame, color);
00064                 if (::In(m_salesRepID, id))
00065                         b->DrawSalesRepTempMark(frame, color);
00066         }
00067 }
